page.title: 11EDUCATION -development
page.content: The Highwood Road site has long been used for educational purposes. The main buildings are pre-war and have housed a grammar school then a secondary modern school, and later a tutorial unit for difficult adolescents. Part of the site now provides community facilities for the village of Brockenhurst. The rest serves three main functions- tutorial centre catering for up to 12 youngsters referred from the 4th and 5th years of local comprehensive schools,-one of the smaller buildings houses the School Psychological Service which serves the South West Hampshire Area, -the rest of the facilities are used by the Education Development Centre, which provides the focus for In-service activities for local schools and colleges in the area.
